title: TravelLens
description: A photo-sharing app for travelers to document journeys with interactive maps.
introduction: TravelLens is a innovative platform designed to revolutionize how travelers document and share their journeys. By combining photo-sharing with interactive maps, TravelLens creates a visually engaging way to capture and relive travel experiences while fostering a community of explorers.

sections.title: Motivation
sections.body: The idea for TravelLens was born out of a frustration with fragmented travel documentation tools. We wanted to create a seamless way for travelers to capture their experiences, share them with others, and relive their journeys in a meaningful way. By integrating photos with maps, we aim to provide a more immersive storytelling experience.

sections.title: Prototype Development
sections.body: We started by building a basic prototype using React Native for the mobile app and Firebase for backend services. The initial version allowed users to upload photos and pin locations on a map. This phase helped us validate the core concept and gather feedback from early users.

sections.title: Challenges and Solutions
sections.body: One of the biggest challenges was integrating the interactive map feature while ensuring smooth performance. We experimented with different mapping libraries and eventually settled on Mapbox for its flexibility and scalability. We also optimized image compression to improve load times without sacrificing quality.

sections.title: Current Features
sections.body: TravelLens now offers a robust set of features, including photo sharing with geolocation tagging, interactive maps for visual storytelling, and a social feed where users can follow and engage with other travelers. We've also implemented privacy controls to allow users to share selectively.

sections.title: Future Plans
sections.body: Looking ahead, we plan to introduce AI-powered photo recommendations, augmented reality features for immersive storytelling, and partnerships with travel brands to enhance user experiences. We're also exploring monetization strategies, such as premium features and affiliate partnerships.
